00006 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedListItem_New(void *obj, EagleBoolean freeObj, void (*free)(void *obj))
00007 {
00008     EagleLinkedListItem *item = (EagleLinkedListItem*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLinkedListItem_New.1", sizeof(EagleLinkedListItem));
00009     if(NULL == item) {
00010         return NULL;
00011     }
00012     
00013     item->obj = obj;
00014     item->freeObj = freeObj;
00015     item->next = NULL;
00016     item->free = free;
00017     
00018     return item;
00019 }

00021 EagleLinkedList* EagleLinkedList_New(void)
00022 {
00023     EagleLinkedList *list = (EagleLinkedList*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLinkedList_New.1", sizeof(EagleLinkedList));
00024     if(NULL == list) {
00025         return NULL;
00026     }
00027     
00028     list->modifyLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00029     list->first = NULL;
00030     list->last = NULL;
00031     list->length = 0;
00032     
00033     return list;
00034 }

00036 void EagleLinkedList_add(EagleLinkedList *list, EagleLinkedListItem *item)
00037 {
00038     if(NULL == list) {
00039         return;
00040     }
00041     if(NULL == item) {
00042         return;
00043     }
00044     
00045     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00046     if(NULL == list->last) {
00047         list->last = list->first = item;
00048     }
00049     else {
00050         EagleLinkedListItem *current = list->last;
00051         current->next = item;
00052         current = current->next;
00053         list->last = current;
00054     }
00055     ++list->length;
00056     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00057 }

00061     int length;

00064         return 0;
00065     }
00066

00068     length = list->length;
00069     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00070     
00071     return length;

00084 void EagleLinkedList_DeleteItems(EagleLinkedList *list)
00085 {
00086     EagleLinkedListItem *p, *next;
00087     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00088     
00089     for(p = list->first; NULL != p; p = next) {
00090         next = p->next;
00091         EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(p);
00092     }
00093     
00094     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00095 }

00100         return;

00107 void EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(EagleLinkedListItem *item)
00108 {
00109     if(item->freeObj) {
00110         if(NULL == item->free) {
00111             EagleMemory_Free(item->obj);
00112         }
00113         else {
00114             item->free(item->obj);
00115         }
00116     }
00117     EagleMemory_Free(item);
00118 }

00130 {
00131     EagleLinkedListItem *head = NULL;
00132     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00133     head = list->last;
00134     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00135     return head;

00138 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedList_pop(EagleLinkedList *list)
00139 {
00140     EagleLinkedListItem *next;
00141     int i;
00142     
00143     if(EagleLinkedList_length(list) == 0) {
00144         return NULL;
00145     }
00146     if(EagleLinkedList_length(list) == 1) {
00147         EagleLinkedListItem *item = list->first;
00148         list->first = list->last = NULL;
00149         --list->length;
00150         return item;
00151     }
00152     
00153     /* find the second last item */
00154     next = list->first;
00155     for(i = 0; i < list->length - 2; ++i) {
00156         next = next->next;
00157     }
00158     
00159     --list->length;
00160     list->last = next;
00161     next->next->next = NULL;
00162     return next->next;
00163 }

00168         return EagleTrue;
00169     }
00170     return EagleFalse;

00173 void** EagleLinkedList_toArray(EagleLinkedList *list, int *size)
00174 {
00175     void **array;
00176     EagleLinkedListItem *p, *next;
00177     int i;
00178     
00179     if(NULL == list) {
00180         return NULL;
00181     }
00182     
00183     *size = EagleLinkedList_length(list);
00184     array = (void**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleLinkedList_toArray.1", sizeof(void*), *size);
00185     
00186     for(p = list->first, i = 0; NULL != p; p = next, ++i) {
00187         array[i] = p->obj;
00188         next = p->next;
00189     }
00190     
00191     return array;
00192 }

00194 void* EagleLinkedList_get(EagleLinkedList *list, int index)
00195 {
00196     EagleLinkedListItem *next;
00197     int i;
00198     
00199     /* out of bounds */
00200     if(index < 0 || index >= EagleLinkedList_length(list)) {
00201         return NULL;
00202     }
00203     
00204     next = list->first;
00205     for(i = 0; i < index; ++i) {
00206         next = next->next;
00207     }
00208     
00209     return next->obj;
00210 }
